column1: The paragraph 10 of the petition states thus;

column2: 10)  The  said report inter alia states that clearing/developing this area
will result blocking of the seasonal movement of the Elephants as  well

column3: loss  of critical  resources  and  habitat.  This  will

column2: elephants  having  to  move  through  villages  and  cultivations  during
their seasonal movements and increased crop raiding by elephants  to
survive.  Therefore  it will  cause  severe  escalation  of human-elephant
